        Prometheus exporter port (8080 by default). Prometheus exporter will not be started if a negative number is given.

      • SERVER_GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE
        scalar.dl.gateway.server.grpc.max_inbound_message_size (Optional)
        The maximum message size allowed for a single gRPC frame. If an inbound message larger than this limit is received, it will not be processed, and the RPC will fail with RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE
        scalar.dl.gateway.server.grpc.max_inbound_metadata_size (Optional)
        The maximum size of metadata allowed to be received. This is cumulative size of the entries with some overhead, as defined for HTTP/2's SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE. The default is 8 KiB.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEDGER_HOST

        public static final java.lang.String LEDGER_HOST
        scalar.dl.gateway.ledger.host (Optional)
        A hostname or an IP address of the server ("localhost" by default). It assumes that there is a single endpoint that is given by DNS or a load balancer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEDGER_TLS_CA_ROOT_CERT_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String LEDGER_TLS_CA_ROOT_CERT_PATH
        scalar.dl.gateway.ledger.tls.ca_root_cert_path (Optional)
        A custom CA root certificate (file path) for TLS communication for Ledger. If the issuing certificate authority is known to the client, it can be empty.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEDGER_TLS_CA_ROOT_CERT_PEM

        public static final java.lang.String LEDGER_TLS_CA_ROOT_CERT_PEM
        scalar.dl.gateway.ledger.tls.ca_root_cert_pem (Optional)
        A custom CA root certificate (PEM data) for TLS communication for Ledger. If the issuing certificate authority is known to the client, it can be empty.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEDGER_TLS_OVERRIDE_AUTHORITY

        public static final java.lang.String LEDGER_TLS_OVERRIDE_AUTHORITY
        scalar.dl.gateway.ledger.tls.override_authority (Optional)
        A custom authority for TLS communication for Ledger. This doesn't change what the host is actually connected to. This is intended for testing, but may safely be used outside of tests as an alternative to DNS overrides. For example, you can specify the hostname presented in the certificate chain file that you set for `scalar.dl.ledger.server.tls.cert_chain_path`.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEDGER_AUTHORIZATION_CREDENTIAL

        public static final java.lang.String LEDGER_AUTHORIZATION_CREDENTIAL
        scalar.dl.gateway.ledger.authorization.credential (Optional)
        An authorization credential for Ledger. (e.g. authorization: Bearer token) If this is given, clients will add "authorization: [credential]" http/2 header.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE

        public static final java.lang.String GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE
        scalar.dl.gateway.grpc.max_inbound_message_size (Optional)
        The maximum message size allowed for a single gRPC frame. If an inbound message larger than this limit is received, it will not be processed, and the RPC will fail with RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE

        public static final java.lang.String GRPC_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE
        scalar.dl.gateway.grpc.max_inbound_metadata_size (Optional)
        The maximum size of metadata allowed to be received. This is cumulative size of the entries with some overhead, as defined for HTTP/2's SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE. The default is 8 KiB.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
